title: Mrs Sippy Seminyak Pool Party (Half-day)
overview: Enjoy Seminyak's iconic pool club with diving boards, cocktails, and a lively atmosphere.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy the saltwater pool and diving boards.
Sip cocktails and enjoy live DJ music.

title: Mrs Sippy Seminyak Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of fun, music, and poolside relaxation at Mrs Sippy Seminyak.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy the saltwater pool, diving boards, and club facilities.
Relax by the pool, enjoy live DJs, or participate in club activities.
